mapper.select: SELECT C.COMMENT_ID AS commentId , C.WRITER_ID AS writerId , C.CONTENT AS content , C.CREATE_AT AS createAt , U.NICKNAME AS nickname , U.PROFILE_IMAGE AS profileImage FROM COMMENT AS C JOIN USER AS U ON C.WRITER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE PARENT_COMMENT_ID = #{parentCommentId} AND STATUS = #{statusPublic} ORDER BY C.CREATE_AT DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
